entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
